item.description:
we all remember the school/college days when we used to play pool all day long !

so i thought that we should have an pool tournament like event.

i will make a roster of participants and we'll play against each other until a final winner is revealed !

It will be an elimination/knockout session!! The final winner will get an prize !

I will be making the reservations.
The cost will be $15 per person (if you play) which you will pay in Cash when u come in. (Note: You are not required to pay if you just wanna hang out !)

You will be responsible for your own tab for drinks and foods.

if someone suggests... we can all go out for food after the event.

We'll meet at 7:45 PM. Please be on time.
Sam.
978-821-3587

Note: Those who are interested about the whitewater rafting event are encouraged to be here. We need to plan for that event.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be next to the reservation counter
item.name: Pool / billards Knockout championship at Jillians!
